GenotypeGraph

Class WeightedGenotypeGraphAllowingMultipleMutations

  • java.lang.Object
    • GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
      • GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraphSimple
        • GenotypeGraph.WeightedGenotypeGraph
          • GenotypeGraph.WeightedGenotypeGraphAllowingMultipleMutations

  • public class WeightedGenotypeGraphAllowingMultipleMutations
extends WeightedGenotypeGraph
    Extension of WeightedGenotypeGraph that allows the reconstruction of genotype graphs with the acquisition of multiple mutation in a single transition when the are not better explanations.
    Author:
    rossi

      protected void linkNodes()

        labels - HUGO symbols for genes
        genotypes - note that a single genotype is a sequence of boolean stating if a gene was or wasn't mutated (in the order defined by labels)
